Tender Announcement: Professional Commissioning Services
=====================================================

**Tender Details**

Tender Reference Number: MX-43099647706
Amendment Number: 3
Solicitation Number: QUMES24
Publication Date: April 18, 2024
Tender Closing Date: May 29, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
Amendment Date: May 29, 2024

**Tender Description**

Defense Construction Canada (DCC) invites consulting firms to submit abbreviated proposals for the establishment of a Source List (SL) to provide professional commissioning services for various locations in Quebec.

The SL will cover:

* New building commissioning in accordance with established standards and processes
* Existing building commissioning or continuous commissioning in accordance with established standards and processes

The RFAP will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document. The objective is to select the consulting firm with the highest total score.

**Contract Details**

The SL will be awarded for a period of two (2) years, with a maximum estimated value of $2,000,000.00. The SL may be extended first for a period of two (2) years, then for a second period of one (1) year, with an increased value of $3,000,000.00.

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is conducted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).

**Security Requirements**

The consultant selected must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) at the level of Reliability status, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**Contact Information**

For any questions regarding this tender, please contact:
Jacob Lachapelle
Phone: 343-550-4560
Email: [jacob.lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:jacob.lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

You can submit a bid and access documents on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
